Docs.summary: Represents a single-row update operation expressed as a command tree. This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks When the <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbUpdateCommandTree.Returning%2A> property is set, the command returns a reader; otherwise, it returns a scalar value indicating the number of rows affected.

Docs.summary: Gets an that specifies the predicate used to determine which members of the target collection should be updated.
Docs.value: An that specifies the predicate used to determine which members of the target collection should be updated.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The predicate can include only the following elements: a <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbComparisonExpression> representing equality; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbConstantExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbIsNullExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbPropertyExpression>; a <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbVariableReferenceExpression> that references the target; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbAndExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbOrExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbNotExpression>.

Docs.summary: Gets an that specifies a projection of results to be returned, based on the modified rows.
Docs.value: An that specifies a projection of results to be returned based, on the modified rows. indicates that no results should be returned from this command.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The returning projection includes only the following elements: <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbNewInstanceExpression>; <xref:System.Data.Common.CommandTrees.DbPropertyExpression>.

Docs.summary: Gets the list of update set clauses that define the update operation.
Docs.value: The list of update set clauses that define the update operation.
